Kara Donehoo

Pittsburgh, PA · kara.donehoo@yahoo.com

I have been a virtual client support specialist for over 6 years. As an experienced virtual client support specialist, I have handled a multitude of complex issues in a timely manner and found creative solutions, providing an exceptional client experience. In providing an exceptional client experience with routine troubleshooting for common issues with video, phone, data, home security, and cellular services via phone and real-time chat, I have offered tailored product solutions based on customer needs and budgets. I have acted as a subject matter expert on all lines of business, such as cable, telephony, home based internet, home automation system and mobile phone services, for both teammates and clients alike.

My professional development recently drew me closer to the social space and providing customer solutions in near real-time. My projects played a critical role in assisting customers on online forums by way of self-help. I am also involved in several employee resource groups during my tenure. This experience has allowed me to participate in a group environment outside of my day-to-day responsibilities while allowing me to exercise my leadership and time management skills.

x

Experience

Customer Experience Associate

Xfinity

Responsible for providing end-to-end support for our customers/communities to ensure a positive experience and that is in accordance with the Company's service delivery strategy. Establishes and builds rapport while promoting effective relationships and upholding our commitment to the customer experience through our Operating Principles, Net Promoter System, and quality behaviors. Responsible for accurately and confidently handling various types of customer inquiries while engaging and building a consultative relationship with our customers. This includes but is not limited to billing inquiries, technical problem-solving, handling sales opportunities, proactively addressing all customer needs, and being a strong advocate for our customers. Actively puts the customer's needs and wants at the center of all interactions. Creates a personal connection to the customer and demonstrates a favorable image of the organization through effective use of soft skills and problem-solving skills, professional communications, and internal/external customer interactions.

May 2017 - Present

Shift Supervisor

Rite Aid

Supervised and helped store associates with daily operational tasks. Assisted customers with their shopping needs and transactions. Tended to merchandise tasks via plan-o-gram. Performed proper receiving and stocking procedures. Counted and reconciled cash register drawers. Prepared deposits and order change from the bank. Ensured store inventory is regularly inspected, removed, or rotated according to the Product Freshness Review Schedule. Maintained a safe, clean, and pleasing environment for customers and associates. Designed a monthly schedule and assign work to foster an efficient and effective workflow.

April 2014 - May 2017

Medical Assistant

Highmark Health

Handled incoming and outgoing calls. Maintained and organized, sterile and sanitary environment and equipment. Filed patient paperwork. Demonstrated knowledge of DME equipment to patients. Prepared patients for minor office surgeries. Referred patients to specialists. Handled patient specimen collection. Handled phlebotomy, Visual Acuity, and pulmonary testing.

July 2010 - December 2011

Store Team Member

Sheetz

Served as a hospitality ambassador by greeting customers and providing an excellent experience. Prepared quality food and beverage items in a fast & friendly manner to meet customer expectations while following proper safety procedures. Completed customer transactions accurately and efficiently, and ensure compliance with applicable age-restricted product regulations such as tobacco and alcohol. Maintained a neat and clean appearance in the store, kitchen, and dining areas, as well as received and replenish food and beverage supplies/products.

September 2008 - June 2010

Interests

In addition to my drive of self-learning opportunities in the technological world, I am also an avid cosplayer, or costume-play. I enjoy attending and participating in cosplaying different characters such as Catwoman or Harley Quinn from the DC Universe or Black Widow from the Marvel Universe and attending the Renaissance Festival each year.


At Comcast, I volunteer with an Employee Resource Group (ERG) whose purpose is to enhance employee engagement by creating an environment where everyone – including LGBTQ+ employees and their allies – is comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work every day. The ERG provides leadership, networking, development, and volunteer opportunities to its LGBTQ and straight-ally members. The ERG contributes to an LGBTQ+-aware and inclusive culture and supports Comcast's goal of attracting, developing, retaining, and engaging diverse talent.
